title: ZebOS routing remote shell service enabled
description: A remote attacker may access the internal ZebOS shell of FortiOS 5.2.3 without authentication on the HA ("High Availability") dedicated management interface only. Only FortiGates configured with HA *and* with an enabled HA dedicated management interface are vulnerable. Note: when a FortiGate is configured to use HA, the dedicated management interface is disabled by default .
